homeHeader.title: Hold, Diversify, and ^Protect Your Assets Globally^ with an Offshore Company in the UAE
homeHeader.description: Losing profits to high taxes, frustrated with banking restrictions, or worried about personal liability risk? At One Nexuz, we optimise your offshore company formation, so you can enjoy 100% ownership, 0% corporate and personal tax, and full confidentiality- all without being physically present.

leftSection_1.title: Preserve Your Assets, Maintain Business Privacy, & Trade Worldwide with Ease
leftSection_1.description: Setting up an offshore company in the UAE offers more than just cost savings- it gives you full strategic control and access to global banking. The area’s favourable economy and tax benefits offer entrepreneurs a lean, fast-track entry into global business.

leftSection_5.title: How We Streamline Offshore Company Setup in the UAE

items.title: Book a Free Consultation
items.description: We’ll start your offshore company setup journey by assessing your unique business goals and recommending the ideal legal structure.

items.title: Create a Trade Name
items.description: Next, our expert business consultants help brainstorm a list of compliant business names and reserve the one that aligns with your goals.

items.title: Collect & Submit Documents
items.description: Once the DED approves your trade name, we’ll assist in compiling and submitting the required documents and paperwork to ensure a seamless setup.

items.title: Choose Your Trade License
items.description: With all the paperwork complete, our proficient consultants help you secure the license that matches your business activities.

items.title: Secure Approvals
items.description: Next, our business advisors submit your company formation application alongside the fees to get approvals from the relevant authorities.

items.title: Get Ongoing Support
items.description: Lastly, we offer tailored post-licensing support to help you set up a corporate bank account, simplify compliance, and stay ahead of regulatory requirements.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is an offshore company in the UAE?
items.answer: An offshore company is a legal business entity set up to operate internationally within designated zones while benefiting from zero tax and 100% foreign ownership.

items.question: Does an offshore company in the UAE have to pay taxes?
items.answer: Nope! Business owners can enjoy zero corporate and personal income taxes in the UAE.

items.question: Do I need to visit the UAE to set up an offshore company?
items.answer: Our experts help streamline the entire registration process so you can get operational in the UAE without ever stepping foot in the Emirates.

items.question: Can One Nexuz assist in opening a corporate offshore bank account in the UAE?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our skilled consultants help you compare and select the ideal UAE offshore bank account to manage your finances.

items.question: What is the cheapest offshore company formation in the UAE?
items.answer: Ajman and Ras Al Khaimah offshore offer the most cost-effective offshore company setup solutions.
